# The `raw_pwrite_stream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

An abstract base class for streams implementations that also support a pwrite operation.

This is useful for code that can mostly stream out data, but needs to patch in a header that needs to know the output size.

Definition at line 434 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h">raw&#95;ostream.h</a>.
